content: free with zigzag yarn 1 2 1 5 free with zig zag yarn 4 3 socks knitted in king cole zig-zag 4ply gauge 28sts and 36 rounds = 10cm 4in over st-st on 3mm needles abbreviations it is important to check your gauge before commencing the socks therefore knit a k = knit p = purl st s = stitch es beg = begin ning cont = continue patt = gauge square if there are less sts to 10cm 4in than number stated change to pattern psso = pass slipped stitch over rem = remain ing repeat = repeat sl = finer needles if there are more sts to 10cm 4in than number stated change to slip sl 1p = slip one stitch purlwise st-st = stocking stitch decrease = together yfwd larger needles = yarn forward for all styles round 7 4th row sl 1p p to 1 st before gap made on 3rd leg needle 1 k6 8 9 12 13 p2 k2 yfwd sl 1 row p2tog p1 turn with 3mm needles cast on 44 52 56 64 68 sts k2tog psso yfwd k2 p2 repeat 3rd and 4th row until all heel sts have been onto one needle needle 2 k10 14 16 18 20 worked ending with a wrong side row 14 16 16 divide sts fairly equally between 3 needles in needle 3 p2 k2 yfwd sl 1 k2tog psso yfwd k2 18 20 sts multiples of 4 p2 k6 8 9 12 13 working in k2 p2 rib work in rounds until work gusset measures 4cm 1½ in from beg round 8 round 1 needle 1 k6 8 9 12 13 p2 k7 p2 needle 1 k across 14 16 16 18 20 heel sts design 1 needle 2 k10 14 16 18 20 socks with ribbed leg needle 3 p2 k7 p2 k6 8 9 12 13 then pick up and k12 14 15 17 18 sts evenly cont in rib until leg measures 15 17 5 20 5 21 5 these 8 rounds form patt down side edge of heel making sure to pick up last 23 cm 6 7 8 8½ 9 in from beg with rib repeat these 8 rounds 4 5 6 6 7 times more st into corner to avoid a hole stretched out or desired length to top of heel work further rounds in knit until leg measures needle 2 k22 26 28 32 34 sts from spare count the rounds worked to this point to ensure 15 17 5 20 5 21 5 23 cm 6 7 8 8½ 9 in needles that both socks will be alike from beg or desired length to top of heel needle 3 pick up and k12 14 15 17 18 sts count the rounds worked to this point to ensure evenly up side edge of heel then k first 7 8 8 9 design 2 that both socks will be alike 10 sts from needle 1
